title: Video: Hooded Fang – Brahma
body:
Back in early August I had the pleasure of stumbling across the Toronto-based sixtet [**Hooded Fang**](http://www.facebook.com/hoodedfangmusic)’s sophomore record, [**_Tosta Mista_**_._](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9555-new-hooded-fang-tosta-mista/ "New: Hooded Fang – Tosta Mista") It was its blend of woozy lovesickRock n’ Roll and good old-fashioned song writing that drew me in so unfathomably at the time. I had moved up north for a few months and frankly, I needed something emotive and fun to get me through.

Thankfully those times are over, I move back into my place in London on Monday, yet the music still moves me. It’s just so fucking pure. The video that dropped for the band’s latest single, **_Brahma_**, is equally so. Made by fine artist **Jake Pauls**, it follows a bird in flight. It’s simply drawn and composed; yet it manages to invoke the complex feelings of freedom in the most inspiring of ways.

Stream the video below.

[HOODED FANG – BRAHMA](http://vimeo.com/29458847) from [DAPS RECORDS](http://vimeo.com/dapsrecords) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
